sentences.en: A lamb goes astray on a forked road.
Allow an extra 10-15 min if you prefer lamb well done.
sentences.cn: 如果想让羊羔肉完全熟透还需要再煮10到15分钟。

sentences.en: He heard the bleat of a lamb.
I braised some beans to accompany a shoulder of lamb.
sentences.cn: 我炖了些豆子，和羊肘子一块吃。

sentences.en: It was always roast lamb and canned peas for Sunday lunch.
sentences.cn: 星期天午餐总是吃烤羔羊肉和豌豆罐头。

sentences.en: Laura was basting the leg of lamb.
sentences.cn: 劳拉正往羔羊腿上浇抹油脂。

sentences.en: March comes in like a lion and goes out like a lamb.
sentences.cn: [谚]三月天来如猛狮,去如绵羊.

sentences.en: Pitt had been lambed down at the Pig and Whistle.
sentences.cn: 皮特在皮克和威斯尔酒吧被诱大笔消费。

sentences.en: She came and put her arms around me. "You poor lamb. What's wrong?"
sentences.cn: 她走过来搂着我。“可怜的宝贝，出什么事儿啦？”

sentences.en: The lamb was a puny little thing.
They had roast lamb for lunch.
sentences.cn: 他们午餐吃的是烤羊肉.

sentences.en: Thinly paint the lamb with Dijon mustard.
sentences.cn: 在羊肉上刷上薄薄一层第戎产的芥子酱。

sentences.en: You should have prepared something other than lamb and ratatouille.
sentences.cn: 除了羊肉和蔬菜杂烩之外，你本应再准备点儿别的。

words.tran_cn: 羔羊般柔弱的人,婴儿,宝贝儿,乖乖

phrases.tran_cn: 最宠爱的人；惟一的宝贝孩子；最珍爱的东西(源自《圣经》)

phrases.phrase: like a lamb to the slaughter

trans.tran_cn: 羔羊，小羊，羔羊肉，<宗>耶稣
